meanings.definition: The act of making marks to ensure alignment or correspondence between two objects.
meanings.sent1: During the matchmarking process, the carpenter carefully placed marks to align the shelves.
meanings.sent2: The matchmarking on the blueprint helped the construction workers align the walls perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The matchmarking mix-up caused the bookshelves to end up sideways!
meanings.sent4: Her matchmarking was so precise, it was like magic ensuring everything fit together seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The matchmarking was like a secret code that only the skilled craftsmen could decipher.

meanings.definition: A mark made to ensure alignment or correspondence between two objects.
meanings.sent1: The matchmarking on the pipes helped the plumber connect them accurately.
meanings.sent2: He made a matchmarking on each piece of wood before cutting to ensure they fit together perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The matchmarking on the puzzle pieces made it easy to put them together.
meanings.sent4: Her matchmarking was like a trail of breadcrumbs leading to the perfect alignment.
meanings.sent5: The matchmarking on the map guided them to the buried treasure.
